caption: Food was not enjoyable. Could have been an off day but I was disappointed after reading so many good reviews about this place. Rasta pasta with shrimp was too spicy to enjoy. Catfish was overly breaded and I had crumbled coarse cornmeal all over my table. Yams had a weird tangy taste and the Mac and cheese was salty like it was from a box. I was hoping for a good meal and received less than. I gave an extra star cause the food did come hot. I will wait a while but I'm not confident in them again enough to try them right away.

I stopped in quickly for a bite to eat to go and I was so happy I did.  I grabbed collard greens, crawfish, macaroni salad and cornbread.    I’m from Staten Island and can honestly tell you I will be back this week for more.  The food was delicious!!
Decided to give this place a try and just glad I did! So far it's been a great experience salmon platter amazing! Same or the catfish platter, delicious.

I accidentally came across this restaurant. But I'm glad I did! The food was amazing!!! I ordered Garlic Butter Shrimp, Four Cheese Mac & Cheese, Collard Greens, Steamed Mussels and Banana Pudding. It was all very tasty and I will definitely return soon.

This spot is 5 star quality seafood/soul food in brooklyn. Everything is good, all of the anchored entree’s, all of the fried options, mac n cheese super cheesy and to top it off a banana pudding that is out of this world!! Great owner and awesome service and courtesy every time. I order from here weekly, its part of the rotation now.

Boyfriend and I went there the night before his birthday and the guy(owner) was absolutely wonderful. The service was great and the food was top notch! When it comes to taste its hands down the best shrimp pasta I've ever had. Only warning I would say is that it is very spicy so order according to ur palette. They are very accommodating in that regard. If u don't want it hot they'll make it mild if you are a spicy fan u can tell them also. We also ordered crablegs and let me tell u I work at a seafood restaurant and I've never seen legs that big not even in the #1 dinner in Brooklyn. Then there was the price which is the best bang for ur buck.

I stopped by here randomly the other day, was feeling for some fried seafood and Sonia’s didn’t disappoint. Everything I ordered was on point, the Mac, my fish sandwich, the fries, the collard greens, the corn bread was all akin to your auntie’s thanksgiving dinner. Matter of fact, I’m headed back to Sonia’s this evening for a meal that feels like a warm hug. <3

Cute and welcoming spot in the heart of Crown Heights, Brooklyn. I absolutely love the crab cakes! The best I've had in a while. Super flavorful, meaty and filling. And the sauce is bomb. I will be revisiting to try other dishes.

Are you tired of generic seafood chain restaurants? I am all for supporting small, black owned businesses but let me be honest; the food here is absolutely amazing! Their seafood boils are so delicious and come in a tray that's easy to reheat. I don't like collard greens but this one has no meat plus a subtle  spiciness that equals perfection. All of the food I've tried has that fresh, made to order taste and this is where I order food when I don't want to cook. It's nice to see the owner's interest in his customers and staff who are all very friendly and attentive. Check it out if you're in the neighborhood.
Great salmon , and they were super friendly

Love Crab so I had to try this place. I had the crabcakes with the Sonja Sauce! Amazing Portion Size and the Sonja Sauce is delicious! THE COLLARD GREENS ARE FIRE!!!!!!!! So so good. There's a kick of heat and the flavor is there! Customer Service means a lot and they do it right. Definitely will be back for the crab legs.
Best banana pudding!! Definitely recommend 👌🏾

Tripped into this place on the humble and my experience (which it is) was WONDERFUL. From the time I walked in the service and aroma informed me that I would be back. The owner was engaging, but the star of the show was the banana pudding he let me try. Wow! Sonia's may have stolen the show of all the eateries on Nostrand...and perhaps Brooklyn. If you love food come to Sonia's STAT!

THE BEST BANANA PUDDING ON EARTH!!!  Amazing customer service, food and really clean inside! Every time I eat there I can never get enough! The workers are SO friendly!! I ALWAYS TIP  (not only because it’s so good but because they ALWAYS smile and that goes a long way in customer service. You MUST try
While I was waiting for my shrimp and fries combo, I was offered some collard greens, something I've never had it was absolutely delicious, session to perfection.

Everything is delicious! My favorite is the shrimp Rasta pasta or chicken sandwich with the garlic Mayo ( you have to request the garlic Mayo) and even tho the chocolate cake is pricey idc I still buy it, it’s that good!
the food and customer service was amazingly good
Food was amazing loved the seafood boil.

Currently having some Mac n cheese, collard greens and salmon as I'm writing this review and OMG! Its all absolutely amazing. The food is flavorful without being overwhelming. The Mac n cheese is out of this world. (I've eaten it 3 days in a row before) Aside from the great food, the owner and staff are very attentive and down to earth. Sonia's has a new loyal customer!

Asked them to grill salmon for me without the sauce and it was seasoned so well. The taste was amazing!! Also, try the collard greens definitely a delicious treat. And VEGAN!! Yes, collards can taste amazing without the Turkey cooked in. Definitely a winner. 5 ⭐️

Stopped by since this place was well dressed 9n the outside and inside. The food is S P O T on. I started off with a small 1/2 shrimp wish I ordered an entire boil.  Hands down best seafood I've had in a while.
Excellent food & service. I had Mac & Cheese, yams, collard greens & salmon.. everything was seasoned perfectly!
Great food & love the reclaimed wood counters!
Great food and service l. Best seafood / soulfood in Crown Heights.

So I stumbled upon this spot a little while ago, looking for a place to get some food while I waited for my hair appt. Well I was quite impressed with the food, decor, and the service. The salmon was cooked to PERFECTION, the Mac & cheese rivaled my family's recipe, and the greens we're SIMPLY AMAZING. I would imagine everything else they offered is just as good & I can't wait to go back. I'd give it 6 STARS if I could. 😁✨💚
Great food ....excellent service....I admit it I’m hook can now call me a regular

An an excellent first experience. The food was great but the MAC AND CHEESE was on another level and everyone needs to try it. I was very impressed by the owner because we took the time out to speak with me and he also treated is staff with compassion and respect. This, I am sure reflected in how great the food and service was. I now have an excuse to visit my family ( how lives nearby) more frequently. Highly recommended

Great food with even greater service! I had the escovich and Jerk snapper, it was more than delicious! They were a great size and were cooked well and with loads of flavor. Definately would order again.

I have been eating here for two months now, and the food is consistently good! The service is pleasant, and the owner is a class act. Eating here for me is a piece of home. If you’re looking for great seafood at affordable prices, look no further!
Very Friendly, good place for a quick bite in Crown Heights. Love the mac & Cheese!
The food was delicious.  Love the greens, reminded me of home.
Excellent service and the food reminds me of eating at my grandma's house.
Awesome portions, great customer service!

The Rasta Pasta is seasoned to perfection, creamy, and the portions are huge! I had to break it up for lunch and dinner. Moreover, the employees and owner himself make it a point to greet you and make you feel valued as a customer.

I had the salmon, candid yams, and collard greens. What a meal! the salmon  sauce had a sweet twist that I was not expecting, but definitely enjoyed. The salmon was also cooked well, and wasn't dried out or undercooked. The greens were flavorful, and the yams were well spiced and sweetened. The portions were great and were in reusable containers that helped with storage.The owner staff were great, they had suggestions, offered suggestions that paired with my usual taste buds, and also other options they had on the menu that I should try.  OH! and how could I forget the cornbread; moist, fluffy, tasteful, and left me wanting more! I will surely come back again, and again, and maybe even another time after that.

The food is soooo good!!! Like literally hands down the best seafood I’ve ever tasted. The crab legs are to die for!!! And the service- especially the customer service is amazing!!! The owner Richard is a really nice guy- he’s super down earth and makes you feel right at home. The food is super affordable and it’s well worth the money spent.
Let’s start with the customer service. Each visit to Sonias Crab and Finn; I always greeted with friendly inviting faces. Now the food each order I would order again.  Thumbs up for this newbie👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿
Great food! Loved the cornbread
This spot gives fantastic service as well as delightful food.  That Mac was on point
Delicious food!  And the service OMG I have no words! I love it!

If you're a seafood and pasta lover, please make sure you come here!! Seriously!! Good food all around. The Shrimp Rasta Pasta was definitely hitting!!🤤🤤 Chicken Tenders were not fried too hard or undercooked. They were perfect. No lie... Will be constantly be coming back!! Mac and Cheese... Delish! Plus the cornbread was nice and soft, sweet and different. But very good.
The food and service here is amazing. Personally love the mac and cheese, lobster and their corn bread. It’s always a pleasure eating here

Omg this spot  on Nostrand  Ave is good, polite and professional  staff, seafood  is fresh,seasoning  on point , love the different  sauces too, mac n cheese  is awesome, jerk lobster 🦞 is a tasty , I love everything,  I'll  recommend  this to my friends.
Fast service great food and  professional staff

The food is amazing! I ordered the snow crab legs, Mac and cheese, candies yams and greens. Everything was amazing! The crab was cooked and seasoned to perfection, not to mention it came with broccoli, red potatoes and corn that were all cooked perfectly as well. The sides were soul food sides. The Mac and cheese is a must have! I can’t wait to try the different sauces that come with the crab legs

Although the food is great they claim to be black owned and I haven’t seen any black people working in there besides the owner (it bugged me). It looks like a Spanish restaurant in there but again the food IS good as well as the service.

I got the large catch boil with the shrimp (Garlic butter) finger smacking good!! Best cornbread I had a while.. and the collard greens took me back to my summers spent in the south.. Overall I will be trying everything on the menu.. Respectfully 😌 lol
Amazing new spot. Glad I found it. Great food selections. Loved the wings! The owner is friendly and professional. A great addition to the neighborhood.
This food was absolutely amazing.  This is my third time eating here and they never disappoint everything was incredibly delicious. Comfort food for the soul 😋

Best seafood restaurant in the neighborhood! I was so impressed by the food that I had to go back the very next day for more. Fried shrimp is my favorite followed by chicken tenders with mac & cheese. Cornbread is absolutely delicious
I truly enjoyed the food. It was fresh and seasoned well. My new go to spot for seafood.
Tried this spot once with my friend and I am obsessed ever since. I loved the good character and delightful dishes and beverages. I recommend this place.

If you’re in the mood for some well seasoned and prepared seafood then do yourself a favor and order from Sonia’s Crab & Finn.  The food is exceptional and leaves you wanting more.  The owner is warm and personable as is his staff. I especially recommend the candied yams as well as the mac n cheese and the collard greens. The seafood boil however stands out as the shining star. This spot is a really wonderful addition to the neighborhood and I anticipate them becoming a favorite for most. I wish them much success.
The greens were very good. Everything is good. There wasn't a long wait. Very professional.

Food was out of this world, really delicious, I had the seafood platter, snow-crab legs, a pound of shrimp, broccoli, potatoes, corn. Seasoned very well with a buttery taste. I also had the coconut shrimp and fries which was delicious as also. Can't wait to go back! The entire neighborhood needs to know about this place. A hidden gem!!P.S. it's also Black owned.
The food was amazing I had a the salmon , cornbread and Mac and cheese 🙏I think u guys should try it out

I have been to Sonia's 3 times in the past 5 days.  Will be returning today as well.  Each visit I ordered a different meal and was not disappointed.  First visit I ordered a seafood boil (1 dungeon crab, 1 lb of shrimp and boiled eggs). The boil comes with corn and potatoes.  The second visit I ordered Escovitch Snapper with Coconut Jasmine rice and collard greens.  The third visit I order garlic butter shrimp with collard greens and fresh salad.  I've also ordered by different modes.  First visit was in-person, second was uber eats and third was grubhub.  Immediately after placing my third order via grubhub, the restaurant called me to report they did not have fresh salad and inquired of another selection I would like.  I selected yams.  When I arrived for food that was ordered in, my order is always ready.  Food is prepared upon order (not just sitting around on hot table tops), warm, tasty and great portion sizes.  I had the liberty of meeting the order on my first and second business.  He's a very hard working, driven individual.  Satisfied Customer, Sheila Evans

By far one of the best seafood joints in town! They have something for everyone, whether you’re a wings lover, a sea food boil fanatic, or feeling for some fresh and tasty fish. The flavors are always on point and they offer a fusion between Southern and Caribbean heat. My favorite dishes so far are the seafood platters, ALL of the Rasta pasta combinations, the fresh fish and crab legs!!! Don’t be shy to stop in and say hello to the friendly staff who are always prepared to give some great recommendations.
The food was amazing! It was so good, I went back the very NEXT day! & I brought a friend! Talk about fresh & tasteful. Platter # 2 is worth every cent.
My first time eating cornbread that taste amazingly delicious.

I had the seafood platter with Lobster, Salmon and Shrimp with Sonia's special sauce...I can't stop thinking about that sauce. It was so good. What I love the most is how fresh everything was, which I think really enhanced the flavors. The customer service was great!!  I will definitely be back.
Crab cakes and mac and cheese were incredible. Can’t wait to try everything! 😎😎😎
Great food and truly great customer service. I will definitely be coming back. Not to mention how generous they are with the food.

I have tried the shrimp garlic butter, calamari , the corn bread and Mac and cheese The food in the restaurant are delicious, the costumer service is great!!! I’ll be back soon! I really recommend to anyone.!!!!

Great,  great place. Customer service is superb and the food is yummy. I voyage down nostrand for some seafood since I didnt like the crab joint on Fulton.  So I tried here and I will continue to buy here. Word life this seafood spot is the best on nostrand Ave

i’m not a seafood lover, but i gave the honey bbq chicken tenders with french fries a shot and it was soooo delicious 🤤 the candied yams, the 4 cheese mac and cheese and grilled salmon were also out of this world, i can’t get enough of it. 10/10 would recommend 🤩
